website_summaries.verdict: Slightly older design, but it still gives you an excellent picture quality with support for HDR technology.
pros: The curved screen draws you into the picture, which is a nice feature for movie watching
Its smart TV features are among the best on the market
cons: Motion rate performance could be a bit better

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Software Issue
customer_reviews.text: There has been a recurring issue with Samsung TV's software. Wifi connection is always strong so that was ruled out. It exits out of the apps on its own at random points in time. Not very happy since it has happened to 2 of them.
customer_reviews.author: jared wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Super TV
customer_reviews.text: Very nice TV, being used as a monitor for a PC. Easy to setup for different laptops, has a nice sound out of built-in speakers, and the curve makes reading in your peripheral vision much easier.
customer_reviews.author: High and Dry

customer_reviews.title: There is software/picture issues with this product.
customer_reviews.text: My biggest issue is that every once in awhile, I turn on the TV and there is no picture. I hear sound but no picture. Everything is plugged in right, and if I turn it off then back on the picture good, but a new TV shouldn't do that. *Update the picture thing is getting worse, and it might be time for a return... how many TVs have this issue, or am the only one?
customer_reviews.author: Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Samung curve TV
customer_reviews.text: This TV only has one button to turn on, If u lose the remote cannot use other features. cannot put in color for the games for my PlayStation. Other then that the TV works fine so far no problem. what can I do to solve this problem? There r no other buttons if so where r they?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very very happy customer! High quality!
customer_reviews.text: I think the TV nowadays are so inexpensive. I remembered this kind of TV will cost 2K before. This gorgeous TV is so good and out of my expectation. I just found out that the chromecast and amazon tv already built in, which give me a surprise. My old chromecast usually out of work when I connected. And I can’t find my amazon tv’s remote control. So you can imagine how much surprise I had. Don’t hesitate. Just buy! Worth every penny meanwhile so low price! ! The picture can’t reflects the picture quality. Every time I saw 4K staff, I feel so enjoy! And the audio system is awesome, too! What a feast!
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Avoid!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed in this tv. There is obviously some kind of wiring defect in the tv. Any apps we use switch off automatically and buffer. We’ve only had the tv for 2 months and it’s already garbage. I’ll never purchase another tv on amazon and will certainly never purchase another Samsung TV.
customer_reviews.author: K.Mac

customer_reviews.title: Great Picture and price
customer_reviews.text: This has a beautiful picture, the curved screen is fantastic. Auto-adjusts for ambient light. Very happy with this TV. Sound isn't the greatest, but other than that we're very happy with this TV.
customer_reviews.author: Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Great innovative design
customer_reviews.text: Gotta love the slight curve in the screen. It just keeps all the colors & light as well as the picture from bleeding out. Great innovative design.
customer_reviews.author: path66002

customer_reviews.title: Crisp Clean Picture
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a TV with rich color and undistorted motion. This TV provides just that. Easy set-up. Typical audio, needs some assistance to make programming intelligible. I'd buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Silver Fox

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: The box arrived with no dents or damages but the tv screen was destroyed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: U get what u pay for
customer_reviews.text: Side viewing angle stinks. Glare is horrible. Blacks are muddy and not deep or sharp. Colors are washed. I have tried different presets as well as a manual adjusting of options. You do get what you pay for especially when purchasing a television.
customer_reviews.author: Optional

customer_reviews.title: Samsung TV rocks
customer_reviews.text: Awesome TV all the way around. One annoying thing was wear there was sticker tape on the screen is still a film cast from the sticker and even after months it is still there but only noticable when the tv is off. Minor but still has an awesome picture none the less. Price was cheap for a great tv. Oh and because of the curve there is never a glare.
customer_reviews.author: Chesley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product with Excellent After-sales service from Samsung.
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is excellent. Customer service from Samsung was unbelievably superb. What more should you expect!!! I am more than happy buying this tv.
customer_reviews.author: RZ

customer_reviews.title: 1 year, 5 months, broke again...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this TV for 1 year and 5 months. It’s been on the same entertainment center, plugged into the same plug since I’ve had it. No moving, no reorganizing of the living room, nothing. It had to have the power supply replaced at the 1 year mark. Now, 5 months later, the TV won’t turn on. It tries to turn on, shuts off, tries to turn on again and repeats this cycle until I unplug it. And now Samsung is saying I have to pay someone to diagnose and fix it. I’ve only ever owned Samsung TV’s, and they’ve always lasted and been great, I’m very disappointed in this TV and Samsung’s lack of care.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Blurry picture
customer_reviews.text: This tv will go from crystal clear to blurry and back. Had the WIFI speed and signal checked. Ive read several people noting a software issue. I rebooted and updated software and still have the issue. Owned the TV 2 years and started to have issues past 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart in 18 months
customer_reviews.text: Got less than 18 months out of it before the backlight started failing and the reflectors started falling off. This is our second Samsung where the reflectors fell off the LED backlights. Won't be buying any more Samsung TVs.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Greenlaw

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together and Use
customer_reviews.text: No issues, no red dots, with excellent display and brightness.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Martin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing television for the average TV viewer
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought this. Would I have paid suggested retail probably not but for $549 absolutely fantastic. Blows away my Samsung tv that I replaced it with and it was only 3 years old and in great condition but I just couldn’t pass on 65% off so my old Samsung smart TV is now my bedroom TV
customer_reviews.author: Twitch

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I would say maybe buy a soundbar because the volume could be higher for sure but the tv is dope! Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Lovingmy2littles

customer_reviews.title: That a modern device such as this should have compatibly. ..
customer_reviews.text: I was sisappointed that I couldn't connect mt audio / bluetoith device. There are not connections for same.
customer_reviews.author: Chris b.

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. Love the curved screen -- no glare!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shop Around
customer_reviews.text: It’s dope but that issue where it dims in the middle is disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Quinton R. Perry

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I love this tv. Easy to set up with a nice pic.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Moeggenberg

customer_reviews.title: Samsung curve tv
customer_reviews.text: I love the tv , only problem there was light scratches on the bottom part of the tv but I let it go and kept the tv. Good purchase though.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Tarquinio

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: My in laws bought this same TV for more than twice the price I paid for it. It was just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: DvG

customer_reviews.title: Great value and amazing picture
customer_reviews.text: We love the TV, perfect size for our small living room. The pictures are great and all the smart functions also. Great value too!
customer_reviews.author: Jgarcia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tv
customer_reviews.text: It arrived early. And it perfect condition and set up was easy and fast. Picture is awesome. Only thing is remote not working thank God I borrowed one for set up. Love this tv. Extremely happy.
customer_reviews.author: Joann Koehler

customer_reviews.title: The TV has an awesome picture. Best TV I have ever owned..
customer_reviews.text: I love the TV, but the remote came and no directions on how it works, plus its broke..
customer_reviews.author: Juanita

customer_reviews.title: Samsung is top quality
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful picture quality. I really don't care for the navigation of menu.
customer_reviews.author: James Kooiker

customer_reviews.title: Factory default
customer_reviews.text: It actually TURNS ON by itself when no one is at home. Maybe factory default. Otherwise is cool.
customer_reviews.author: Emeka

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t had this tv for a year and having problems with it
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana Turner

customer_reviews.title: I GOT IT BROKEN
customer_reviews.text: When I received it it was comepletly broken cracked and all.
customer_reviews.author: RIDVAN  BytyQi

customer_reviews.title: TV receive in bad state for the 2nd times
customer_reviews.text: i received this TV with one break on the back as show in the picture. this issue was reported during delivery to your team
customer_reviews.author: Kakule Didier Paluku

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Not a scratch on delivery, easy to assemble and beautiful picture. Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Smillz

customer_reviews.title: Good price for great quality tv
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that the tv arrived not broken. The quality is great exactly what I expected. I have a sound bar so I use that for audio but the tv audio didn't seem bad.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar

customer_reviews.title: Excitement dead.
customer_reviews.text: The box has no damage to the outside, or inside, everything looks brand new and untampered with, however the screen is damaged, you don’t see it right away but if you shine light into the screen you can see the scratches. I am going to take pictures and discontinue setup. I was purposely being careful, including wearing gloves so as to not leave fingerprints, this is a total disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Dan S.

product_meta.title: Samsung 7 Series UN55NU7300 Smart TV, Curverd 55-Inch 4K UHD, 2018 Model
product_meta.description: Ahead of the curve with the clarity of the Nu7300. Like its Nu7100 flat sibling, it has 4x the resolution of Full HD. Non-4k TV content is upscaled to 4K with an immersive curve. The curve is the clear choice.
feature_bullets: Your purchase includes One Samsung 7 Series UN55NU7300 Smart TV, Curverd 55-Inch 4K UHD, 2018 Model, one TM1240A Control with batteries, One power cable, and User Manual
TV Dimensions: Without Stand – 48.7" W x 28.1" H x 4.1" D. With Stand – 48.7” W x 31.2" H x 10.3" D. Product Weight: 40.1 lbs. VESA Mount compatibility
Power: Power Supply (V) – AC110-120V 50/60Hz. Typical Power Consumption – 65. Maximum Power Consumption – 140
Enjoy millions of shades of color, fine-tuned to create an incredibly vibrant picture. View stunning high dynamic range content with a TV designed to support HDR10+
With a motion rate of 120, get drawn into the action on a curved screen with a surprisingly slim bezel

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars96 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
